title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. VII, pt. 208 - Access to Records of the Board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. VII, pt. 208 - Access to Records of the Board

State Regulations
§ 208.1 - Records available for public inspection and copying
§ 208.2 - Designation of records access officer and appeals officer
§ 208.3 - Procedures for inspection and copying of records
§ 208.4 - Denials and appeals
§ 208.5 - [Repealed]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. VII, pt. 208

Statutory authority: Civil Service Law, art. 14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
